entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing near midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
